thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Carol Brady
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Carol Brady

author: Carol Brady
title: Carol Brady
text: We couldn't get the side zip Galway top for my son in his size in the local lifestyle shop so the young lad on the counter asked if we'd like to order it online. He ordered it and that was an afternoon and it arrived the following afternoon by courier. Fantastic. I had one very happy boy who hasn't taken the top off since.
